title: How to change “a house is built” to a passive voice - Quora

response.answer_text: The “ active voice” means that the subject of the sentence is doing the action. Example: ““John sang the song” or ““Marissa won the trophy.” The “passive voice” means the subject is being acted upon and often the one doing the action is not identified. “The song was sung by John” or ““The trophy was won by Marissa” or “The war was won” or ““The mission was accomplished.” Your sentence, ““A house is built” is already passive.
